Posts.Content: Hello!  Trying to find some hope here.  My sweet friend was just diagnosed with stage 4 colon cancer that has spread to her other organs including her liver.  How do you stay positive?  I am reading a book called,"It's just hair: 20 Essential Life Lessons" by Judith L. Pearson.  It is a non-fiction self-help book for women battling breast cancer or anyone facing a challenge in life. http://www.courageconcepts.com/
Posts.Title: Finding Hope
